EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you last week for our webinar.
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We're sorry you weren't able to join us for our last installment in the "What You Can Do With Hadoop" webinar series on March 27, 2014.
Pivotal introduced its core components for our Business Data Lake and covered recent enhancements that provide more powerful and high performing analytics, leveraging in-memory technologies for real-time processing and analysis.
We invite you to watch the replay of the session here <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/introduction-to-pivotals-next-generation-analytic-data-lake?utm_source=Pivotal&utm_medium=pivotal-email-datalake-q22014&utm_campaign=pivotal-email-datalake-q22014>.
Pivotal made an exciting announcement today that will change the economics of Big Data forever. The merging of traditional and next-generation data infrastructure technologies is defined as a “Business Data Lake” - a priority for CIOs in 2014 and beyond.
Interested in learning more about Pivotal Big Data Suite – enabling you to Store Everything, Analyze Anything, and Build The Next Right Thing? Join us <http://www.gopivotal.com/big-data/webinar/pivotal-big-data-suite-change-the-economics-of-big-data-forever?utm_source=Pivotal&utm_medium=pivotal-email-datalake-q22014&utm_campaign=pivotal-email-datalake-q22014> for our upcoming webinar on Wednesday, April 23, 2014 at 9:00AM PDT/5:00PM GMT+1.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team
